parameter.name: Database server
parameter.descr: Host on which the database server is running (for servers running on unix domain sockets, enter the socket's path (usually /tmp), or leave this field empty)

parameter.name: Databázový server
parameter.descr: Hostitel, na kterém databázový server běží (pro servery běžící na soketu unixové domény zadejte cestu k soketu (obvykle /tmp) nebo ponechte toto pole prázdné)

parameter.name: Databaseserver
parameter.descr: Vært hvorpå databaseserveren kører (for servere der kører domænesokler til unix indtastes soklens sti (normalt /tmp), eller feltet efterlades tomt)

parameter.name: Datenbankserver
parameter.descr: Rechner, auf dem der Datenbankserver läuft. Für Server, die auf einem UNIX-Domain-Socket laufen,geben Sie den Pfad des Sockets ein (üblicherweise /tmp) oder lassen Sie dieses Feld leer

parameter.name: གནས་སྡུད་གཞི་རྟེན་སར་བར།
parameter.descr: གནས་སྡུད་གཞི་རྟེན་སར་བར་འདི་གུ་ཧོསིཊི་འདི་གཡོག་བཀོལ་དོ(ཡུ་ནིགསི་ཌོ་མེན་སོ་ཀེཊིསི་གུ་སར་བར་ཚུ་གཡོག་བཀོལ་མི་གི་དོན་ལུ་ སོ་ཀེཊི་གི་འགྲུལ་ལམ་འདི་བཙུགས(སྤྱིར་བཏང་/གནས་སྐབས)ཡང་ན་ས་སྒོ་འདི་སྟོངམ་བཞག)།

parameter.name: Εξυπηρετητής βάσης δεδομένων
parameter.descr: Ο οικοδεσπότης στον οποίο ο εξυπηρετητής της βάσης δεδομένων τρέχει (για εξυπηρετητές που τρέχουν σε υποδοχείς τομέα unix, εισάγετε τη διαδρομή της υποδοχής (συνήθως /tmp), ή αφήστε αυτό το πεδίο κενό)

parameter.name: Database server
parameter.descr: Host on which the database server is running (for servers running on unix domain sockets, enter the socket's path (usually /tmp), or leave this field empty)

parameter.name: Database server
parameter.descr: Host on which the database server is running (for servers running on unix domain sockets, enter the socket's path (usually /tmp), or leave this field empty)

parameter.name: Datumbaza servilo
parameter.descr: Host on which the database server is running (for servers running on unix domain sockets, enter the socket's path (usually /tmp), or leave this field empty)

parameter.name: Servidor de bases de datos
parameter.descr: El equipo en el que se está ejecutando la base de datos (para los servidores ejecutándose bajo sockets de dominio UNIX, introduzca la ruta del socket (generalmente /tmp), o deje este campo vacío)

parameter.name: Datu-base zerbitzaria
parameter.descr: Ostalaria, datu-basearen zerbitzaria exekutatzen ari dena (unix domeinuko socket-ean exekutatzen diren zerbitzarien socket-en bide-izena idatzi, normalean /tmp, edo eremu hau hutsi utzi)

parameter.name: Database server
parameter.descr: Host on which the database server is running (for servers running on unix domain sockets, enter the socket's path (usually /tmp), or leave this field empty)

parameter.name: Tietokantapalvelin
parameter.descr: Tietokantapalvelimen verkkonimi. UNIX-pistoketta käyttäville palvelimille anna pistokkeen polku (yleensä /tmp), tai jätä kenttä tyhjäksi.

parameter.name: Serveur de base de données
parameter.descr: Hôte sur lequel fonctionne le serveur de base de données (pour les serveurs fonctionnant avec les sockets de domaine Unix, saisissez le chemin du socket (généralement /tmp) ou laissez le champ vide)

parameter.name: Database server
parameter.descr: Host on which the database server is running (for servers running on unix domain sockets, enter the socket's path (usually /tmp), or leave this field empty)

parameter.name: Servidor de bases de datos
parameter.descr: O equipo anfitrión no que o servidor da base de datos está a executarse (para servidores executándose sobre conectadores de dominio UNIX, introduza a ruta do conectador (usualmente /tmp), ou deixe este campo baleiro)

parameter.name: Database server
parameter.descr: Host on which the database server is running (for servers running on unix domain sockets, enter the socket's path (usually /tmp), or leave this field empty)

parameter.name: Database server

parameter.name: Server basis data
parameter.descr: Host tempat server basis data berjalan (untuk server yang berjalan pada soket domain unix, masukkan path soket (biasanya /tmp), atau biarkan ruas ini kosong)

parameter.name: Server database
parameter.descr: Host sul quale funzioni il server del database (per i server che funzionino su socket in dominio Unix, inserire il percorso del socket, normalmente /tmp, o lasciare questo campo vuoto)

parameter.name: डाटाबेस सर्भर
parameter.descr: होस्ट जसको डाटाबेस सर्भर चलिरहेको छ ( युनिक्स डोमेन सकेटहरूमा सर्भरहरू चलाउन, सकेट मार्ग(प्राय /tmp) प्रविष्ट गर्नुहोस्), वा यो फिन्ड छोड्नुहोस्)

parameter.name: Databaseserver
parameter.descr: Host on which the database server is running (for servers running on unix domain sockets, enter the socket's path (usually /tmp), or leave this field empty)

parameter.name: Database server
parameter.descr: Host on which the database server is running (for servers running on unix domain sockets, enter the socket's path (usually /tmp), or leave this field empty)

parameter.name: Servidor de base de dados
parameter.descr: Host no qual o servidor da base de dados está a correr (para servidores a correr em sockets de domínio unix, digite o caminho para o socket (normalmente /tmp), ou deixe este campo vazio)

parameter.name: Servidor de banco de dados
parameter.descr: A máquina na qual o servidor de banco de dados está executando (para servidores operando em soquetes de domínio Unix, informe o caminho do soquete (normalmente /tmp) ou deixe este campo em branco)

parameter.name: Сервер баз данных
parameter.descr: Компьютер, на котором запущен сервер базы данных (для серверов запущенных с помощью доменных сокетов Unix введите путь к сокету (обычно /tmp) или оставьте это поле пустым)

parameter.name: Database server
parameter.descr: Host on which the database server is running (for servers running on unix domain sockets, enter the socket's path (usually /tmp), or leave this field empty)

parameter.name: Database server
parameter.descr: Host on which the database server is running (for servers running on unix domain sockets, enter the socket's path (usually /tmp), or leave this field empty)

parameter.name: Strežnik podatkovnih zbirk
parameter.descr: Gostitelj na katerem teče podatkovni strežnik (za strežnike ki so zagnani na unix domeni vtiča, je treba vnesti pot vtiča (običajno /tmp), ali pa je treba polje pustiti prazno)

parameter.name: Database server
parameter.descr: Host on which the database server is running (for servers running on unix domain sockets, enter the socket's path (usually /tmp), or leave this field empty)

parameter.name: Сервер базе података
parameter.descr: Домаћин на коме ради сервер базе података (за сервере који раде на прикључницама јуниксовог домена, унесите путању прикључнице (обично је „/tmp“), или оставите ово поље празним)

parameter.name: Database server
parameter.descr: Host on which the database server is running (for servers running on unix domain sockets, enter the socket's path (usually /tmp), or leave this field empty)

parameter.name: Server baze podataka
parameter.descr: Domaćin na kome radi server baze podataka (za servere koji rade na priključnicama juniksovog domena, unesite putanju priključnice (obično je „/tmp“), ili ostavite ovo polje praznim)

parameter.name: Databasserver
parameter.descr: Host on which the database server is running (for servers running on unix domain sockets, enter the socket's path (usually /tmp), or leave this field empty)

parameter.name: Database server
parameter.descr: Host on which the database server is running (for servers running on unix domain sockets, enter the socket's path (usually /tmp), or leave this field empty)

parameter.name: Database server
parameter.descr: Host on which the database server is running (for servers running on unix domain sockets, enter the socket's path (usually /tmp), or leave this field empty)

parameter.name: Database server
parameter.descr: Host on which the database server is running (for servers running on unix domain sockets, enter the socket's path (usually /tmp), or leave this field empty)

parameter.name: Máy phục vụ cơ sở dữ liệu
parameter.descr: Máy trên đó chạy trình phục vụ cơ sở dữ liệu (đối với máy phục vụ chạy trên ổ cắm miền UNIX, hãy nhập vào đường dẫn của ổ cắm [thường là « /tmp »], hoặc bỏ rỗng trường này)

parameter.name: 数据库服务器
parameter.descr: 正在运行数据库服务器的主机 (对于运行在 Unix 域套接字上的服务器，输入套接字的路径 (通常为 /tmp)，或留此字段为空)

parameter.name: 資料庫伺服器
parameter.descr: 運行資料庫伺服器的主機（對於運行於 unix domain socket 的伺服器，輸入 socket 的路徑（通常是 /tmp），或將欄位留空）

parameter.name: 資料庫伺服器
parameter.descr: 運行資料庫伺服器的主機（對於運行於 unix domain socket 的伺服器，輸入 socket 的路徑（通常是 /tmp），或將欄位留空）

parameter.name: Port
parameter.descr: Database server port (for servers running on unix domain sockets, enter the socket's file name extension (usually 5432), or leave this field empty)

parameter.name: Port
parameter.descr: Database server port (for servers running on unix domain sockets, enter the socket's file name extension (usually 5432), or leave this field empty)

parameter.name: འདྲེན་ལམ།
parameter.descr: གནས་སྡུད་གཞི་རྟེན་སར་བར་འདྲེན་ལམ་(ཡུ་ནིགསི་ཌོ་མེན་སོ་ཀེཊིསི་གུ་སར་་བརཚུ་གཡོག་བཀོལ་མི་གི་དོན་ལུ་སོ་ཀེཊི་གི་ཡིག་སྣོད་མིང་རྒྱ་བསྐྱེད་བཙུགས(སྤྱིར་་བཏང་༥༤༣༢)ཡང་ན་ས་སྒོ་འདི་སྟོངམ་བཞག)།

parameter.name: Priključnik

parameter.name: 端口

parameter.name: Connection timeout
parameter.descr: Maximum wait for connection, in seconds. Zero or not specified means wait indefinitely. It is not recommended to use a timeout of less than 2 seconds

parameter.name: Časový limit připojení
parameter.descr: Maximální doba čekání na připojení, v sekundách. Nula nebo nezadaná hodnota znamenají nekonečné čekání. Není doporučeno použít časový limit kratší než 2 sekundy.

parameter.name: Connection timeout
parameter.descr: Maximum wait for connection, in seconds. Zero or not specified means wait indefinitely. It is not recommended to use a timeout of less than 2 seconds

parameter.name: Verbindung abgelaufen
parameter.descr: Maximale Wartezeit auf eine Verbindung, in Sekunden. Null oder keine Angabe bedeutet unendlich langes Warten. Es wird nicht empfohlen, eine Ablaufzeit von weniger als 2 Sekunden zu wählen.

parameter.name: Connection timeout
parameter.descr: Maximum wait for connection, in seconds. Zero or not specified means wait indefinitely. It is not recommended to use a timeout of less than 2 seconds

parameter.name: Χρονικό όριο σύνδεσης
parameter.descr: Μέγιστη αναμονή της σύνδεσης, σε δευτερόλεπτα. Το μηδέν ή μια ακαθόριστη τιμή σημαίνει επ' αόριστον αναμονή. Δεν συνιστάται η χρήση χρονικού ορίου μικρότερου των 2 δευτερολέπτων

parameter.name: Connection timeout
parameter.descr: Maximum wait for connection, in seconds. Zero or not specified means wait indefinitely. It is not recommended to use a timeout of less than 2 seconds

parameter.name: Connection timeout
parameter.descr: Maximum wait for connection, in seconds. Zero or not specified means wait indefinitely. It is not recommended to use a timeout of less than 2 seconds

parameter.name: Connection timeout
parameter.descr: Maximum wait for connection, in seconds. Zero or not specified means wait indefinitely. It is not recommended to use a timeout of less than 2 seconds

parameter.name: Tiempo de espera de la conexión
parameter.descr: Espera máxima, en segundos, para una conexión. Un valor de cero o sin especificar significa esperar indefinidamente. No se recomienda usar un tiempo de espera inferior a 2 segundos.

parameter.name: Konexioaren denbora-muga
parameter.descr: Konexioaren gehienezko itxaroten egoteko denbora (segundotan). Zero edo zehaztu gabeko balioak betirako zain egongo dela adierazten du. Ez da 2 segundo baino txikiagoko denbora-muga erabiltzerik gomendatzen.

parameter.name: Connection timeout

parameter.descr: Maximum wait for connection, in seconds. Zero or not specified means wait indefinitely. It is not recommended to use a timeout of less than 2 seconds

parameter.name: Connection timeout
parameter.descr: Maximum wait for connection, in seconds. Zero or not specified means wait indefinitely. It is not recommended to use a timeout of less than 2 seconds

parameter.name: Tempo de espera da conexión
parameter.descr: Espera máxima, en segundos, para unha conexión. Un valor de cero ou sen especificar significa agardar de forma indefinida. Non se recomenda usar un tempo de espera inferior a 2 segundos.

parameter.name: Connection timeout
parameter.descr: Maximum wait for connection, in seconds. Zero or not specified means wait indefinitely. It is not recommended to use a timeout of less than 2 seconds

parameter.name: Connection timeout
parameter.descr: Maximum wait for connection, in seconds. Zero or not specified means wait indefinitely. It is not recommended to use a timeout of less than 2 seconds

parameter.name: Koneksi habis waktu
parameter.descr: Waktu tunggu koneksi maksimum, dalam detik. Nol atau tak dinyatakan berarti menunggu selamanya. Tak disarankan untuk memakai tenggang waktu kurang dari 2 detik

parameter.name: Fuori tempo massimo connessione
parameter.descr: Attesa massima per la connessione, in secondi. Zero o non specificata significa aspettare indefinitivamente. Non è consigliato usare un valore minore di 2 secondi

parameter.name: Časovna omejitev povezave
parameter.descr: Najdaljši čas čakanja na povezavo v sekundah. Vrednost 0 določa neprekinjeno čakanje. Vrednosti krajše od 2 sekund niso priporočene.

parameter.name: Connection timeout
parameter.descr: Maximum wait for connection, in seconds. Zero or not specified means wait indefinitely. It is not recommended to use a timeout of less than 2 seconds

parameter.name: Време истека везе
parameter.descr: Највише чекање за везу, у секундама. Нула или не наведено значи чекаће неодређено. Не препоручује се коришћење време истека мање од 2 секунде

parameter.name: Connection timeout
parameter.descr: Maximum wait for connection, in seconds. Zero or not specified means wait indefinitely. It is not recommended to use a timeout of less than 2 seconds

parameter.name: Vreme isteka veze
parameter.descr: Najviše čekanje za vezu, u sekundama. Nula ili ne navedeno znači čekaće neodređeno. Ne preporučuje se korišćenje vreme isteka manje od 2 sekunde
